div.p:
There's other ways we can interact with rival clans on the campaign
map. Agents allow us to undermine our enemies with guile and cunning.

They can also be recruited at our cities in the same way as units.
The buildings present in a city dictate the type of agent

Agents earn experience as the campaign progresses, enabling us to upgrade
their talents and abilities. Each Agent type has their own unique

skill tree, so we can nurture them and create specialists in a
particular role.

Let's use an agent now. With our Geisha selected,
right-clicking on an enemy army, character or city, presents us

with a variety of actions. Agents also offer bonuses to our
